trans-unit.source: Use office phone as your contact method with Azure MFA
trans-unit.target: Use office phone as your contact method with Azure MFA

trans-unit.source: This page will show users how to use their office phone as the primary contact method for Azure MFA.
trans-unit.target: This page will show users how to use their office phone as the primary contact method for Azure MFA.

trans-unit.source: Use office phone as your contact method with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Use office phone as your contact method with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: If you want to use your office phone as your primary contact method you can use this article.
trans-unit.target: If you want to use your office phone as your primary contact method you can use this article.

trans-unit.source: It will walk you through setting up multi-factor authentication to use your office phone for a call as your contact method.
trans-unit.target: It will walk you through setting up multi-factor authentication to use your office phone for a call as your contact method.

trans-unit.source: To use your office phone as your contact method
trans-unit.target: To use your office phone as your contact method

trans-unit.source: Select Office Phone from the drop-down
trans-unit.target: Select Office Phone from the drop-down

trans-unit.source: Setup
trans-unit.target: Setup

trans-unit.source: Specify your country from the drop-downn and enter your mobile phone number.
trans-unit.target: Specify your country from the drop-downn and enter your mobile phone number.

trans-unit.source: Select the mode you would prefer to use with your mobile phone - text or call.
trans-unit.target: Select the mode you would prefer to use with your mobile phone - text or call.

trans-unit.source: Click Next.
trans-unit.target: Click Next.

trans-unit.source: Click the Verify Now button.
trans-unit.target: Click the Verify Now button.

trans-unit.source: This will initiate a call to your office phone.
trans-unit.target: This will initiate a call to your office phone.

trans-unit.source: Be sure you are near it.
trans-unit.target: Be sure you are near it.

trans-unit.source: Click Next
trans-unit.target: Click Next

trans-unit.source: At this point, you have setup your contact method and now it is time to setup app passwords for non-browser apps such as Outlook 2010 or older.
trans-unit.target: At this point, you have setup your contact method and now it is time to setup app passwords for non-browser apps such as Outlook 2010 or older.

trans-unit.source: If you do not use these apps click **Done**.
trans-unit.target: If you do not use these apps click **Done**.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise continue to the next step.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise continue to the next step.

trans-unit.source: If you are using these apps then copy the app password provided.
trans-unit.target: If you are using these apps then copy the app password provided.

trans-unit.source: Paste the password that was copied to the clipboard into your non-browser application.
trans-unit.target: Paste the password that was copied to the clipboard into your non-browser application.

trans-unit.source: For steps on individual applications such as Outlook and Lync see How to change the password in your email to the app password and How to change the password in your application to the app password.
trans-unit.target: For steps on individual applications such as Outlook and Lync see How to change the password in your email to the app password and How to change the password in your application to the app password.

trans-unit.source: Click Done.
trans-unit.target: Click Done.

trans-unit.source: Setup
trans-unit.target: Setup
